scripts.regen-migrations: node db/scripts/deleteMigrations.js && npx sequelize-mig migration:make -n init
scripts.db-all: npm run db-drop && npm run db-create && npm run regen-migrations && npm run migrations && npm run db-seed
scripts.tests: concurrently -k "cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run dev" "wait-on tcp:3000 && npm run reset-test-db && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha tests/*.js"
scripts.reset-test-db: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db-drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db-create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migrations && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db-seed
